page.title: 17Other hospitals
page.content:
The Eccles and Patricroft Hospital opened as a sick dispensary in 1878 in Byron St, Patricroft. It developed into a proper hospital and remained so until 1967 when it reopened as a maternity hospital, which it still is.
Ladywell Hospital opened in 1892 as a hospital for infectious diseases. In 1947 it became a geriatric hospital and nowadays it has a special ward for lung cancer patients and orthopaedic patients as well as elderly patients. The buildings still look old and very forbidding in appearance. 782 895
